items.title: New Zealand dad shot dead by police after years on the run with children
items.description: Tom Phillips disappeared with his three children in 2021 after losing a custody battle.

items.title: Trump threatens tougher sanctions after Russia's heaviest strikes on Ukraine
items.description: Trump's threat of sanctions comes after Russia's heaviest attack of the war.

items.title: Five killed in Jerusalem shooting attack, paramedics say
items.description: Israeli police say two gunmen were "neutralised" after the attack at a bus stop, in which seven other people were seriously wounded.

items.title: Watch: Glitz, glamour and emotional speeches at VMAs 2025
items.description: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) have taken place in New York, with high profile figures in the music industry taking to the red carpet.

items.title: Mushroom murder survivor's plea to grieve away from the spotlight as wife's killer jailed
items.description: As Erin Patterson was sentenced, her sole surviving victim Ian Wilkinson called for privacy and kindness.
